dcterms:creator: Bing Liu
Ian Lane
dcterms:description: The NLU-Benchmark dataset is annotated with scenarios, actions, and entities, covering multiple home assistant tasks such as playing music or calendar queries, chit-chat, and commands issued to a robot. It contains 25,716 utterances, split into 10 folds with 9960 training and 1076 test utterances each.
dcterms:title: NLU-Benchmark

dcterms:creator: Charles T. Hemphill
John J. Godfrey
George R. Doddington
dcterms:description: ATIS is a well-studied dataset in the field of NLU, comprising annotated transcripts of audio recordings of people making flight reservations. It contains 4,478,500 training utterances and 893 test utterances.
dcterms:title: ATIS

dcterms:creator: Alice Coucke
Alaa Saade
Adrien Ball
Théodore Bluche
Alexandre Caulier
David Leroy
Clément
dcterms:description: SNIPS is a dataset collected from the Snips personal voice assistant, containing 13,784 training examples and 700 test examples.
dcterms:title: SNIPS
